name: src/ballotBox.test.ts
src/ballotBox.ts
flags
description:
This object tracks the flags used for SV ballot boxes. They determine the submission
methods and whether ballots are tracked as binding, official, or testing.

For more info see docs.secure.vote

name: mkPacked
description: Creates a packed copy of start and end times with submissionBits

params.name: start
params.description: Start time in seconds since epoch

params.name: end
params.description: End time in seconds since epoch

params.name: submissionBits
params.description: Submission bits - can be created using mkSubmissionBits

return.description:
Returns a `bn.js` BigNum of the packed values.
 Format: [submissionBits(16)][startTime(64)][endTime(64)]

name: mkSubmissionBits
description: This combines flags into a finished submissionBits. It also does some validation.

unknown.tagValue:
{number}
 A 16 bit integer of combined flags.

params.name: toCombine
params.description:
Array of all submission flags to combine. See SV.ballotBox.flags for flag options.
 All flags must be a power of 2 (which indicates they occupy a single bit in the number when combining).

return.description: A 16 bit integer of combined flags.

name: mkSignedBallotForProxy
description: Take the arguments and produce web3 data fitting the `submitProxyVote` method.

unknown.tagValue:
{object}
 { proxyReq (bytes32[5]), extra (bytes) } in the required format for `submitProxyVote`

params.name: sequence
params.description: the sequence number to use (0 < sequence < 2^32)

params.name: voteData
params.description: the vote data to use, should be 32 bytes hex encoded

params.name: extra
params.description: any extra data included with the vote (such as curve25519 pubkeys)

params.name: opts
params.description:
options:
  - skipSequenceSizeCheck: boolean (will not throw if sequence is >= 2^32)

return.description: { proxyReq (bytes32[5]), extra (bytes) } in the required format for `submitProxyVote`

name: verifySignedBallotForProxy
description: Verify a signed vote to be submitted via proxy as generated by `mkSignedBallotForProxy`

params.name: opts
params.description: Not used currently; for future options

name: genRange3VoteData
description: Prepares voteData for a Range3 ballot from an array of votes

unknown.tagValue:
{string}
 Returns an eth hex string of the vote data

params.name: votesArray
params.description:
Takes an array of numbers which represent the votes to be transformed
 Format: [1, 2, -1]

return.description: Returns an eth hex string of the vote data

name: src/const.ts
src/crypto.ts

params.name: data
params.description: A message to hash - if it is hex it'll be UTF8 decoded.

name: ethSignHash
description:
Sign a message such that it can be verified with `ecrecover`.
Similar to `web3.eth.accounts.sign` except that we sign the hash directly.

unknown.tagValue: {{messageHash: string, r: string, s: string, v: string}}

params.name: messageHash
params.description: Hash of a message, as returned by `web3.utils.soliditySha3` or similar.

types: {messageHash: string, r: string, s: string, v: string}

params.name: messageHash
params.description: This should be an Ethereum HexString

export * from './const.js'

export * from './light.js'
export * from './utils.js'

name: src/light.ts
getContractAddresses
description: Takes in the svNetwork object and returns all relevant addresses

name: src/types.ts
src/utils.ts
cleanEthHex
description:
This will take an Ethereum hex string (or a normal hex string) and
output a normal hex string (no '0x' header) or throw an error on a
bad hex string.

name: ethAddrEq
description: This compares ethereum addresses (taking into account case, etc)

name: hexToBase32
description: This will convert a hex string to Base32 in the bech32 format WITHOUT a checksum.

unknown.tagValue:
{string}
 The Base32 version of the hex string.

params.name: hex
params.description: The hex string to convert to Base32 - can be an EthHex or plain hex string.

return.description: The Base32 version of the hex string.

content:
# sv-lib

Library for supporting SecureVote Light apps

## Usage

`const SV = require('sv-lib');`

### `SV.utils`

`cleanEthHex`

Takes a string that should be hex, and removes the `0x` header if present.

`hexToBase32`

Takes a hex string and returns the base32 conversion using the alphabet from the `bech32` standard; though doesn't include a checksum.
This is used in serializing democracy hash prefixes.

**Note: does not conform to bech32 standard**

### `SV.ballotBox`

`flags`

An object with keys corresponding to the names for various flags. All flags are a power of 2 (so can be combined via bitwise OR).

`mkPacked`

Takes startTime, endTime, and submissionBits (should all be JS ints) and packs them for the SV Light Ballot Box.

`mkSubmissionBits`

Takes an array of flags (see SV.ballotBox.flags) and returns the submission bits. Also throws errors on badly constructed flags.

`mkSignedBallotForProxy`

Takes `ballotId`, `sequence`, `voteData`, `extra`, `privateKey`, and `opts = {}` and returns `{proxyReq, extra}` in the format required for `BBFarm.submitProxyVote(proxyReq, extra)`.

the `opts` param is optional.

`genRange3VoteData`

Takes an array of votes in range `[-3,3]` and returns a `bytes32` eth hex string (suitable for using directly with web3 Contracts)

### `SV.const`

Utility Constants:

* `zeroAddr` - address that's all zeros
* `zeroHash` - a `bytes32` string that's all zeros
name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "sv-lib",
  "version": "0.1.12",
  "description": "SecureVote Light supporting functionality",
  "main": "dist/index.js",
  "types": "dist/index.d.ts",
  "homepage": "https://github.com/secure-vote/sv-lib#readme",
  "author": {
    "name": "Max Kaye",
    "email": "max@secure.vote"
  },
  "bugs": {
    "url": "https://github.com/secure-vote/sv-lib/issues"
  },
  "bundleDependencies": false,
  "dependencies": {
    "assert": "^1.4.1",
    "axios": "^0.18.0",
    "bs58": "^4.0.1",
    "colors": "^1.3.0",
    "esdoc-typescript-plugin": "^1.0.1",
    "eth-ens-namehash": "^2.0.8",
    "eth-lib": "^0.2.8",
    "ethereumjs-util": "^5.2.0",
    "ramda": "^0.25.0",
    "sha256": "^0.2.0",
    "web3": "^1.0.0-beta.34",
    "web3-eth-abi": "^1.0.0-beta.34",
    "web3-eth-accounts": "^1.0.0-beta.34",
    "web3-utils": "^1.0.0-beta.34"
  },
  "deprecated": false,
  "keywords": [
    "SecureVote",
    "voting",
    "crypto",
    "blockchain"
  ],
  "license": "UNLICENSED",
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "git+https://github.com/secure-vote/sv-lib.git"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@types/jest": "^23.3.0",
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-ecmascript-proposal-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "jest": "^23.4.1",
    "minami": "^1.2.3",
    "ts-jest": "^23.0.1",
    "typescript": "^2.9.2"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "dev": "tsc -w",
    "test": "jest",
    "docs": "esdoc",
    "prepublish": "tsc && yarn docs"
  },
  "jest": {
    "transform": {
      "^.+\\.tsx?$": "ts-jest"
    },
    "testRegex": "(/__tests__/.*|(\\.|/)(test|spec))\\.(jsx?|tsx?)$",
    "moduleFileExtensions": [
      "ts",
      "tsx",
      "js",
      "jsx",
      "json",
      "node"
    ],
    "testPathIgnorePatterns": [
      "/node_modules/",
      "/dist"
    ]
  }
}
